casebody.data:
SAMUEL RUSSELL FLIPPEN, et al
v.
MARVIN POLK in his official, capacity as Warden of Central Prison, Raleigh, N.C. No. 178A95-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina August 17, 2006

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 17th day of August 2006 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006.
